metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3100 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in the openstack-barbican component. This issue allows an access policy bypass via a query string when accessing the API.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3100` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

barbican-api - 2:15.0.0-0ubuntu1
barbican-common - 2:15.0.0-0ubuntu1
barbican-keystone-listener - 2:15.0.0-0ubuntu1
barbican-worker - 2:15.0.0-0ubuntu1
python3-barbican - 2:15.0.0-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: barbican package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:15.0.0-0ubuntu1').
